author: ceki
msg: - Many tests (but not all run green).
Given the recent changes to PatternLayout, it now requires that the
activateOptions be called. Otherwise, the conversion pattern settings
DOMConfigurator had a bug whereby it forgot to call activateOptiions on
nested components. Now it does call activateOptions on nested components.

author: ceki
msg: - Removed etra brace casuing compilation to fail

author: ceki
msg: - Internal logging is now on even after a LogManager.resetConfiguration.
(Temporary code. All this will be radically changed when Domains enter
- PropertySetter.setProperties method no longer activates the options
of OptionHandlers. This results in slighly less confusing code.
Changed ProppertyConfigurator to take thismodification  into account.
- Renamed test cases from XTestCase to XTest where X varies.
